title: SEBASTIAN SHAKESPEARE: Commons Speaker John Bercow bags three foreign jollies in a month
text:
Thwarted, as I disclosed, from joining Wimbledon's exclusive All England Croquet And Lawn Tennis Club, John Bercow has enjoyed the consolation of no fewer than three overseas jaunts in the past month.

He fitted in speaking engagements in New York and Boston, appeared on a chat show in Amsterdam and delivered a speech in Zurich.

All in all, these treats enabled him to enjoy hospitality worth £5,123.51.

The Speaker of the House of Commons, John Bercow, has enjoyed three overseas jaunts in the past month. In total, these treats enabled him to enjoy hospitality worth £5,123.51

The Speaker's office explains that the purpose of the engagements is 'self-explanatory'.

Indeed it is.

Bercow was talking about his favourite subject on each occasion: 'My role as Speaker.'
